no_tts_platforms.title: Chime TTS
no_tts_platforms.description:
ℹ️ No TTS Platforms Found.

The Chime TTS integration uses TTS platform/s already installed in your Home Assistant Instance.

Please add at least 1 TTS platform to begin using it.

For more details please review the documentation.
